sentences.en: ...the surveyor's maps of the Queen Alexandra Range.
sentences.cn: …亚历山德拉皇后山脉勘测图。

sentences.en: A surveyor said that the problems were caused by subsidence and the house needed to be underpinned.
sentences.cn: 一名勘测员说是地面下陷导致了这些问题出现，房子需要加固地基。

sentences.en: Call in an architect or surveyor to oversee the work.
sentences.cn: 找个建筑师或监理员来监工。

sentences.en: He was appointed official county surveyor a year later.
sentences.cn: 一年后,他被正式任命为县的土地测量员.

sentences.en: Here's a report from a well - known public surveyor in London.
sentences.cn: 这是伦敦一家有名的公证行出具的检验报告.

sentences.en: Independent surveyor's report shall be final and binding upon both parties.
sentences.cn: 检验报告为最终检验依据,双方均认可.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the accurate of root length surveyor.
sentences.cn: 目的:评价根管长度测量仪测量根管工作长度的准确性.

sentences.en: Our surveyor warned us that the house needed totally rebuilding.
sentences.cn: 我们的鉴定人警告我们这栋房子需要彻底重建。

sentences.en: The surveyor found damp in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 房屋测量员发现厨房里有水渍.

sentences.en: The surveyor pegged out the lot of land.
sentences.cn: 测量员用木桩标出那块地。

sentences.en: The surveyor pegged out the plot of land.
sentences.cn: 测量员用木桩标出那块地.

sentences.en: The surveyor was returning to his car, when he saw the beast.
sentences.cn: 当时,这名测量员正准备返回自己的车, 忽然看到不远处有一头北极熊.

sentences.en: The surveyor will use a lap-top computer to give on the spot advice.
sentences.cn: 检测员会用一台手提电脑当场给出意见。

sentences.en: We have the best surveyor, China and Export Commodity Inspection Bureau.
sentences.cn: 我们有最好地公证行, 即中国进出口商品检验局.

sentences.en: We have the best surveyor, China Export Commodity Inspection Bureau.
sentences.cn: 咱们有最好的公证行, 即中国进出口商品检验局.

trans.tran_cn: 测量员，勘测员，检查员，调查员，鉴定人
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to examine the condition of a building, or to measure and record the details of an area of land
